messages.subject: RE: Family responsibility
messages.msgSnippet: ... and a pillow and stay with that one while the older one did whatever (unless it was the hottest or coldest part of the year).
messages.messageBody:
>>For early morning stuff, I'd carry the toddler to the car with a blanket
and
a pillow and stay with that one while the older one did whatever (unless it
was the hottest or coldest part of the year).<< Sandra

::splort!:: Nice segue, Sandra. I was still on the conjugal issue, and you
go right into "early morning stuff" and I'm still trying to figure out why
you're kicking the toddler out into the car while you had time with Keith
and... oh! It's a different topic!

Hey, "early morning stuff" is one of my favorites, and I don't mean swimming
lessons!

Karen <g>
